divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I went outside to enjoy the meteor shower about 10:30 pm Central time. Aproxamately 15 minutes later Julie pointed out a dim moving light in the eastern sky. It appeared to be a satellite(I have spent many hours at the beach and have seen hundreds of satellites). We watched the object for about 1 minute as it moved from north to south. Suddenly the object became very bright for aproxamately 2 seconds then dimmed to a lower magnitude then it origionaly was and instantly changed direction heading to the south east and sped out of sight. As I stated earlier I have seen hundreds of satellites but I have never seen anything like this before.
Summary: Dim Star like object in Eastern sky moving slowly north to south got real bright then sped off to the south east
trends: There have been no other sightings in Aberdeen
This sighting has never been favorited.
